name: Kanto Resistence
description:
Survive a horde of demons through fighting and building fortifications!

In this wave based survival fighting game you and your friends will be defending your base center with your own mastery of the blade and building defenses!

Be aware that time is of the essence and the demons only come at night, cooperate with your friends during the daytime to be able to collect and build before nightfall.

As the waves progress you will be facing increasingly fierce enemies that will test your skills and coordination!
